--input-epsilon 1.000000e-02
--output-epsilon 1.000000e-02
--threads 5
--solver map_parallel
--function "(abs((((-(x)) * (((pow(x, 6) - (interval(4.20000000000000000000e+01, 4.20000000000000000000e+01) * pow(x, 4))) + (interval(8.40000000000000000000e+02, 8.40000000000000000000e+02) * pow(x, 2))) - interval(5.04000000000000000000e+03, 5.04000000000000000000e+03))) / interval(5.04000000000000000000e+03, 5.04000000000000000000e+03))))"
--input "{'x' : (-1.57079632679000003037e+00, 1.57079632679000003037e+00)}"
